doc.title: Hunting Chris Ryan
doc.plot: In a each of a series of three programmes, former SAS soldier, 'Chris Ryan (III)' (qv), is dropped into one of the world's most extreme environments, in which he has to survive, complete a mission and finally escape to a rendezvous point, whilst evading capture by a 4 man "Hunter" force, comprised of former US and UK Special Forces soldiers.
